about_the_game:
WARNING:

There is a risk of seizures related to photosensitivity. Some people may experience seizures triggered by flashing lights and flickering images, which are common in video games. Even those who have never had such seizures before might be unaware of their condition. We recommend a reasonable restriction on the audience for the game.

Anomaly 13 is a horror game in the walking simulator genre with puzzle elements. As a prospective buyer, Cooper Evans, you will explore a mysterious house and try to uncover its secrets.

  • Explore the house's surroundings.

  • Pay attention to changes in the environment.

  • Solve puzzles and complete assigned tasks.

Overview:

The Anti-Anomaly Organization (AAO) has identified a unique anomaly, designated as "13." To study it in detail, AAO agents have installed hidden cameras in a mysterious house that is soon to be auctioned.

The protagonist, eager to purchase the house at a bargain price, decides to make it their new home. As you move in with your belongings, you remain unaware of the strange events awaiting you.

Anomaly 13 is a horror game that emphasizes shifts in time and space.

Features:

  • Immersive Gameplay: Dive into an atmosphere of escalating horror.

  • Stunning Graphics: AAA-level visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5 with DLSS3 support create a detailed and ominous world to explore.

  • Innovative Mechanics: The gameplay is built around navigating a timeline. Be prepared for gradually increasing complexity and content depth.

  • Unpredictable Enemies: The entity known as Anomaly 13 constantly changes form—it could be a monster, a mysterious orb, or something else entirely.

  • Atmosphere: Drawing from over 100 popular horror games, we’ve blended the best elements to craft our experience.

Typeface © Wizard Games. 2012. All Rights Reserved.

name: Anomaly 13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements should allow for Low/Medium quality settings in 1080p | 30-60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 2070RTX | AMD Radeon™ RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements should allow for Maximum quality settings with ray tracing at 30-60 FPS in 1080p

short_description: Anomaly 13 is a psychological horror walking simulator with puzzle elements. As Cooper Evans, a house buyer, you’ll explore a mysterious home to uncover its secrets. The game features four distinct locations that you’ll traverse to progress through the storyline.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
